page.title: 04MOVING TO A NEW HOUSE
page.content: I used to live in a small village called Butlers Marston near Stratford upon Avon. My dad is a sales representative for a large computer company with an area of about 200 square miles in the Midlands. We decided to move to Solihull to be more central for my dads job. We liked this part of the town because there is a lot of new houses being built on the edge of the green belt, so it still feels like living in the country. The new roads like the by-pass, the M42 and M6 means that travelling is much easier for my dad.
